title: European Social Fund 'helped me change my life'
content: This video can not be playedBlair Anderson from Ballymena says the opportunity provided by the European Social Fund helped her transform her life.The funding previously provided by the ESF finishes at the end of March and has not been replaced in full.Blair says she fears the most vulnerable young people in Northern Ireland will miss out on the opportunities she had as a result.Read more: Axing EU funding 'will leave people in deep water' <>
